conbody.p: You can install on Windows using any of the following methods:

ul.li: Install using the Windows installer in unattended mode.

Install from the archive oxygen.tar.gz
oxygenAuthor.tar.gz
oxygenDeveloper.tar.gz
oxygenXMLDiff.tar.gz
syncroSVNClient.tar.gz (the all platforms installer). Choose the all platforms installer if you have trouble installing using the Windows installer.

conbody.p: If you have difficulties installing the product, use the () archive distribution. Just unzip it in a directory where you have write permissions and use the product launchers.
conbody.draft-comment: Two things are unclear about this paragraph. 1. Is the archive distribution different from the all platforms installer? This paragraph talks about .zip files, but the all platforms installer talks about .tar.gz files. 2. What does "use the product launchers" mean? Is a reference to the oxygen.bat etc. files mentioned in the all platforms installer.
